messages.message:
Do we have plans to allow members to be added to an organisation as a reviewer? I'm wondering how these people get informed that there are docs waiting for them to take action on?

At the minute I can only see admin or member roles available in AI Hub

We are working on more structured review mechanisms for the future with review queues. In 24.24 though, a member on a workspace is usually considered someone who reviews. If they go on the review tab in a workspace, they will see documents that require a review that are assigned to them or that are unassigned.
